title: Building US-China relations ... by banjo
description: Abigail Washburn wanted to be a lawyer improving US-China relations -- until she picked up a banjo. The TED Fellow tells a moving story of the connections she's formed touring across the US and China while playing that banjo and singing in Chinese.
author: Abigail Washburn
keywords: TED, talks, Asia, TED Fellows, china, culture, entertainment, music, world cultures, live music
